Package net.jini.url.https

Provides support for HTTPS URLs.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HttpsIntegrityVerifier
    Integrity verifier for HTTPS URLs.

Package net.jini.url.https Description

Provides support for HTTPS URLs.

The HttpsIntegrityVerifier class defines an integrity verifier for HTTPS URLs. This class is intended to be specified in a resource to configure the operation of Security.verifyCodebaseIntegrity.

Since:
2.0
Version:
1.0
